channel.title: CVE Feed for MJS Software -- PT Sign Ups – Beautiful volunteer sign ups and management made easy
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MJS Software -- PT Sign Ups – Beautiful volunteer sign ups and management made easy

item.title: CVE-2024-24848|2024-07-05T17:21:26.159Z -- mjs%20software -- pt%20sign%20ups%20%E2%80%93%20beautiful%20volunteer%20sign%20ups%20and%20management%20made%20easy
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in MJS Software PT Sign Ups – Beautiful volunteer sign ups and management made easy allows Stored XSS.This issue affects PT Sign Ups – Beautiful volunteer sign ups and management made easy: from n/a through 1.0.4.
